name: viseron
description: Viseron is a self-hosted surveillance system with real-time object detection. It ingests camera streams, performs AI detection, and exposes recorded events and snapshots via a web interface.
features: Object detection: Detect people, vehicles, and objects in camera streams using AI models.
Real-time processing: Analyze camera feeds in real-time for immediate detection and alerts.
Motion detection: Trigger recording and alerts based on motion in specific zones.
Recording: Record video clips when objects are detected or motion occurs.
Snapshots: Capture still images of detected events for quick review.
Web interface: View live streams, recordings, and events through a web dashboard.
Multiple cameras: Monitor multiple camera streams simultaneously from one interface.
Zone configuration: Define detection zones to ignore irrelevant areas and reduce false alerts.
Hardware acceleration: Use GPU acceleration for faster object detection processing.
Home Assistant integration: Integrate with Home Assistant for smart home automation.
Notification support: Send alerts via various channels when objects are detected.
Privacy-focused: Process all video locally without sending data to cloud services.
